fieldUpdates.description: Job Assignment must be blanked out when cloning a new job.

fieldUpdates.description: Clears job completion date when job is marked back to "Won" from "Complete".

fieldUpdates.description: Clears job completion date when job is marked back to "Won" from "Complete".

rules.description: When an AE gets assigned to a job, they get notified ONLY on approved job.
When an AE gets assigned to a job, they get notified ONLY on approved job.
When an AE gets assigned to a job, they get notified ONLY on approved job.
Workflow field update to populate ATI Job Name with 'Job Name | Job Number'

rules.fullName: Alert Collections for certified%2Funion project types
rules.description: Email notification sent to collections for all Jobs with a Project Type of 'Prevailing Wage / Certified' or 'Union'

rules.fullName: Alert File Clerk when Jobs are marked Lost
rules.description: Email notification to flie clerk when Opportunity Stage is set to Lost

rules.fullName: Alert payroll when job is PW%2C union%2C or biohazard
rules.description: If project type is union, certified or division is biohazard, and only if job stage is Won, notify Payroll and set task for Project Manager for new hire orientation. Task Due date is 6 hours within assignment
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c , "Biohazard"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Union"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Certified") ) && ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Won"),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Email Alert to Branch Managers to assign a Project Director to a Job.

rules.fullName: BM email for PD assignment - new
rules.description: Email Alert to Branch Managers to assign a Project Director to a Job.

rules.fullName: BM email for PD assignment- SF%2FSJ
rules.description: Email Alert to Branch Managers to assign a Project Director to a Job.
When this checkbox is check, it will send email to EVP's, BM, PM, Super, and Ops Manager.

rules.fullName: Clear PN Request Date if Send Prelim is No

rules.description: Stamps the Date that a Job's Stage was set to Complete
rules.formula: AND(ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), OR( AND(ISNEW(), OR(TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Work Complete', TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Billing Complete')), AND(ISCHANGED(Stage__c ), OR(TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Work Complete', TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Billing Complete')) ) ,$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.fullName: Construction Job to Blank Ops Manager
rules.formula: AND( OR( TEXT(Division__c )== 'Construction', TEXT(Division__c )== 'Marketing' ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Division__c ) ),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Workflow email alert to notify PM and AE that there is an ERA related to a Job

rules.fullName: Email Alert to Scott Moore for new Anaheim E%2FS jobs
rules.formula: AND(Office2__c = 'Orange' , ISPICKVAL(Division__c, "Emergency Svces") ,$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Field update to clear out 'Add/Correct Email' field after trigger to populate updated email onto Contact record
rules.formula: AND(Add_Correct_Email__c != null,$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: When City of LA throws an error, it will send an email to recipient

rules.formula: OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Demolition'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Construction') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Demolition'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Construction') ))))
AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Demolition'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Construction') ))
AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Consulting')))

OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Consulting'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Consulting') ))))

OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Contents'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Contents') ))))
AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Contents') ))

OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Catastrophes'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Emergency Svces') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Catastrophes'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Emergency Svces') ))))
AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Catastrophes'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Emergency Svces') ))

OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Asbestos'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Biohazard'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Lead'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Microbial') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Asbestos'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Biohazard'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Lead'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Microbial') ))))

AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Asbestos'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Biohazard'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Lead'), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Microbial') ))

OR(AND( Estimate_Only__c = false, Ladder_Assist__c = false, Completion_Date__c >= DATE(2019,01,19), No_Email_Available__c = false, Project_Site_Contact_Name__c != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.Email != '', Project_Site_Contact_Name__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Technical Svces'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete')),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution"),(AND( ManualSurveySend__c = True,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Technical Svces') ))))

rules.fullName: Getfeedback Technical Services Survey Remainder Email
rules.formula: AND( !ISNULL(Survey_Sent_Date__c) , Survey_Completed__c == false,OR( ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Technical Svces') ))

rules.description: Notification goes to: Gary Moore Doug Fairless Tom McGuire Luan Nguyen Channyn Rowe
Populates the previous job number if job number is changed.
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED( Job_Number__c ),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Outbound message to send Opportunity fields to Timberline via Jitterbit
rules.formula:
AND(OR(AND(ISCHANGED(Stage__c),ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Won")) ,Sync_to_Timberline__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED(PM_Approval_Only__c), AND(OR(ISCHANGED(Project_Manager_new__c), ISCHANGED(Project_Manager__c),ISCHANGED(Account_Executive_1_Timber__c),ISCHANGED(Account_Executive_2_Timber__c),ISCHANGED(Job_Name__c)),NOT(ISBLANK( Last_Successful_Timberline_Update__c)), X1sub__c = FALSE)),
$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Clears job start date and completion date when job is marked "Lost"
When Job name has changed, email Vonda Barela that Job name has changed.
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(Job_Name__c),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: When Job number has changed, email Jenny Pace, Vonda Barela, and payroll.
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED (Job_Number__c) , $Profile.Name <> 'Restricted Process Execution')

rules.description: Stamps the Date that a Job's Stage was set to Won (and overwrites Job Start Date each time)
rules.formula: AND(OR(AND(ISNEW(),TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Won'),AND(ISCHANGED(Stage__c ),TEXT(Stage__c) = 'Won')),$Profile.Name <> 'Restricted Process Execution')
AND( NOT( (ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Job_Type__c, ""))) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "Work Complete")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "Billing Complete")),$Profile.Name <> 'Restricted Process Execution')

rules.fullName: Job Workflow for LA County Educational
rules.description: If Job is LA county educational or governmental and stage is won, mark the Job as union. Look at Job class (school or government agency) and county is LA.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( County__c , "Los Angeles"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c,"Won"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Municipality/ Gov't"), ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Educational") ),$Profile.Name <> 'Restricted Process Execution')

rules.description: If Job is SD USD, mark the Job as Certified. Look at Job class (school or government agency) and county is SD
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( County__c , "San Diego"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Municipality/ Gov't"), ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Educational") ),$Profile.Name <> 'Restricted Process Execution')

rules.description: Population of the Last Job Date to be used in Bonus calculations of New Business vs. Existing Business.
A workflow email alert will be created to alert a Project Director immediately following Job assignment.
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId = '0120g000000l3yM' && (ISCHANGED( Project_Manager__c )),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")
AND(RecordTypeId = '01270000000UPGF' && (ISCHANGED(Project_Manager_new__c)),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")
AND(ISCHANGED(Description__c),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Sends an email when a Project Manager is assigned to a job
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISCHANGED( Project_Manager_new__c ), ISNEW()),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Records date/time of last change to/from Won Stage
rules.formula: AND(OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Won") ), AND( ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"Won")) ),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Populates the previous job name if job name is changed.
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISCHANGED( Name ) , ISCHANGED( Job_Name__c )),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Records the user that modified the 'Send Prelim' field and the date/time of modification.
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED( Send_Prelim__c ),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.fullName: Send client welcome email when job is marked won
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.description: Sends client welcome email when the job is marked as won and there is a superintendent/operations manager entered

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.description: Sets the modified allocations field to "22.5" for jobs where PM is Rudi Suminski, Brian Bailey, Consultant, Thomas Moreno, Andy England, or Aaron Berkman.

rules.fullName: Set PN Request Date if Send Prelim is Yes
Set Send Prelim field to no for program jobs
rules.description: Workflow rule to update 'Send Prelim' field to 'No' for most program Jobs, all national accounts (lead source), all contents, marketing, and consulting jobs, certain accounts, and all jobs in certain states.
rules.formula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(Send_Prelim__c, "") &&
((BEGINS(TEXT(Lead_Source__c), "Program") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Program - Contractor Connection"))) ||
BEGINS(TEXT(Lead_Source__c),"National Account__r") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Contents") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Consulting") || ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Educational") || ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Municipality/ Gov't") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Allstate") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Alacrity") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Encompass") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "CSAA") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Farmers") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Watterson") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "JC Penney") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "JP Morgan Chase") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Wyndham Worldwide") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "National Community Renaissance") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Burlington Northern") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Facility Source") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Jones Lang LaSalle Americas") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "2B Adjusting") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Essex Property Trust") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Wal-Mart") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "City of Phoenix") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Aimco Property Management") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Cushman & Wakefield") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "St. Joseph's Hosp.") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Walgreens") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Watterson Environmental Group") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Prometheus Real Estate Group") || BEGINS(Account__r.Name, "Irvine Company") || Project_Site_State__c = "CO" || Project_Site_State__c = "CT" || Project_Site_State__c = "DE" || (Project_Site_State__c = "FL" && ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Residential")) || Project_Site_State__c = "HI" || Project_Site_State__c = "ID" || Project_Site_State__c = "IL" || Project_Site_State__c = "KY" || Project_Site_State__c = "MD" || Project_Site_State__c = "NE" || Project_Site_State__c = "NJ" || Project_Site_State__c = "NY" || Project_Site_State__c = "ND" || Project_Site_State__c = "PA" || Project_Site_State__c = "VT"),$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.fullName: Task reminder to PM to call customer at 42 hours after approval
rules.description: Automatic task creation 42 hours after approval of an opportunity if the PM has not yet modified the record.
rules.formula: AND ( RecordTypeId = "012n00000000B3t", ISPICKVAL (Stage__c, "Qualified"), Date_Time_Approved__c > LastModifiedDate,$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.fullName: Update 1sub checkbox%2C PM%2C and PM Approval Only checkbox
rules.description: If Cort Gilliam is the Project Director, check the 1sub checkbox, assign the PM as Pete Carlson, and check the PM Approval Only checkbox.

rules.fullName: Update Close Date when Won or Lost

rules.description: Updates Last Timberline Update field with current date time when a record is saved.
rules.formula:
AND(OR(AND(ISCHANGED(Stage__c),ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Won")) ,Sync_to_Timberline__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED(PM_Approval_Only__c), AND(OR(ISCHANGED(Project_Manager_new__c), ISCHANGED(Project_Manager__c),ISCHANGED(Account_Executive_1_Timber__c),ISCHANGED(Account_Executive_2_Timber__c),ISCHANGED(Job_Name__c)),NOT(ISNULL( Last_Successful_Timberline_Update__c)), X1sub__c = FALSE)),
$Profile.Name <> "Restricted Process Execution")

rules.description: Kelli Smith would like to be notified for any lead is created for bay area.

tasks.description: Call the Union, bring in workers for new hire orientation and contact payroll to discuss hiring procedures. Task is due within 6 hours of creation. Escalate to Steve if not completed.
tasks.subject: Call Union, Bring in New Hires & Contact Payroll

tasks.description: It has been 42 hours since this Job has been approved and the record. Please follow up with the client.
tasks.subject: Reminder to follow up with job contact
